article_node.title: Moses Itauma Vs. Dillian Whyte: Odds, Records, Prediction
article_node.summary: The piece previews Dillian Whyte’s upcoming bout against 20‑year‑old prospect Moses Itauma, noting Whyte’s recent knockout losses and the expectation that Itauma could stop him early, with betting odds heavily favoring the younger fighter. It also references Whyte’s rematch with Alexander Povetkin and a potential fight with Tyson Fury, outlining Whyte’s ambition to regain title contention and the contrasting styles and records of each opponent. Overall, the article highlights Whyte’s challenging path against rising talent and seasoned champions, offering odds, predictions, and context for each matchup.
